Header: Tenders called for gas deposit developments in Sri Lanka
Content: Secretary to the Ministry of Petroleum Industries, Dr. B.M.S Batagoda, says tenders have been called for the development of two identified gas deposits. Speaking to News 1st, he added that requirement of the Government is to expedite the petroleum resources exploration process. He went on to note that tenders, locally and internationally, will be called for the development of the deposits that have been identified.
